content:
Closed the tree, validate-toolstate is failing:

+ /scripts/validate-toolstate.sh
Cloning into 'rust-toolstate'...
<Nothing changed>
HTTPError: HTTP Error 403: Forbidden
b'{"message":"Must have admin access to view repository collaborators.","documentation_url":"https://docs.github.com/rest/reference/repos#list-repository-collaborators"}'
We should probably disable validation for now
most everything in toolstate doesn't break much I think?
This is just for the MAINTAINERS list which almost never changes.
I can post a PR to disable it for now.
I wish GitHub was more transparent about their api changes.

Looks like GitHub pushed a big update to the windows image which has updated the windows debugger from 20348 to 22000, which has broken one of the cdb tests. The output looks almost correct, so I can maybe poke at fixing it, but I gotta go for a bit. I'll be back soon.

https://github.com/actions/virtual-environments/commit/adce9b620b4d376a9e6a77b7acbc93e6949a3254#diff-816219d3c9f30fcc1c40f88ca826c1662bf99eded781c1b419dd2dfb577ae227

@Wesley Wiser Not sure if you're online right now and can take a quick peek at the error here: https://github.com/rust-lang-ci/rust/runs/3614607040

It looks like the output just shifted a little.
Putting an ignore windows in for now should be ok
